charinfo.name: Konan of the Rain (S)
charinfo.description: Konan of the Rain (S) has returned to the Hidden Rain village. Now that Uzumaki Nagato is dead she is aligned with Uzumaki Naruto and his quest for peace.

abilities.name: Paper Chakram
abilities.description: Konan of the Rain (S) hurls a Paper Chakram at one enemy dealing 35 piercing damage. Konan of the Rain (S) will ignore stun effects for 1 turn when this skill is used.

abilities.name: Paper Ocean
abilities.description: Using Paper Ocean Konan of the Rain (S) and all allies gain 10 points of damage reduction for 2 turns. For 2 turns all enemies that use a new skill will have the cooldown of that skill increased by 1 turn.*

abilities.name: Explosive Tags
abilities.description: Konan of the Rain (S) uses Explosive Tags on one enemy dealing 15 damage. This skill becomes Paper Shurikens permanently when used.

abilities.name: Paper God Technique
abilities.description: This skill makes Konan of the Rain (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
